'Nik & Jay' is a Danish R&B / Hip-Hop / pop duo made of Niclas Genckel
Petersen (born on 8 November 1980 in Herlev) and Jannik Brandt Thomsen (born
on 16 June 1981).

Their #2 single Hot! won them Hit of the Year and Best New Artist at the
Danish Music Awards in 2003. Other hits have included En Dag Tilbage (One Day
Left), LÃ¦kker (Hot in Danish), Kan Du HÃ¸re Hende Synge? (Can you hear her
sing?) and Boing!.

They released a CD and DVD of their concert tour from 2003.

The single "Boing!" and the album, 3: Fresh - Fri - Fly have given them even
more success and a bigger variety of ages among the fans.
